title: All-inclusive cruises announced as interest in Cuba grows
text:
All-inclusive cruises announced as interest in Cuba grows All-inclusive cruises announced as interest in Cuba grows THE Celestyal Cruises brand, Cuba Cruise, has announced an all-inclusive programme including an unlimited bar and beverage package plus complimentary excursions that showcase “the real Cuba”. PUBLISHED: PUBLISHED: 11:20, Tue, Aug 4, 2015 PH Cuba Cruise: Enjoy an all-inclusive programme and discover 'the real Cuba' 
The new all-inclusive element comes on seven-day cruises that includes two full days in Cuba’s colourful capital Havana, with an included city tour, as well as calls at the island’s Cienfuegos, where passengers can explore an 18th-century fortress, and historic Santiago de Cuba – the Spanish colony’s capital from 1522 until 1589. GETTY Spend two full days in Cuba’s colourful capital Havana 
There is also a day spent snorkeling or scuba diving at the palm-fringed beach at Maria la Gorda in Cuba’s UNESCO Biosphere Reserve on the Guanahacabibes Peninsula, which has 32 dive sites among the coral reefs. 
The cruises finish or begin at either Havanna or from neighbouring Jamaica’s Montego Bay, where the included excursion is a visit to historic plantation house Greenwood Great House.“ 
The Celestyal Cruises family welcomes a new era of Cuba Cruise this year, our third season cruising to Cuba, with the launch of our brand new all-inclusive programme,” said Pythagoras Nagos, Celestyal Cruises’ vice president of sales. GETTY Explore the historic Santiago de Cuba 
“Cuba Cruise is the best and most economical way to experience Cuba’s historical highlights, white-sand beaches, infectious music and vibrant pulse of the entire island and its wonderful people, all provided to our passengers with a single, seamless itinerary. 
“We are proud to offer an authentic Cuba travel experience to our guests for the third straight year as we continue to improve our product, which we believe is the unchallenged value-for-money cruise to the best of Cuba. 
”Cuba Cruise operates on 1,200-passenger Celestyal Crystal, which serves Cuban food and offers Cuban entertainment during the “best of Cuba” voyages. 
Celestyal Cruises is a Greek cruise operator and Cuba Cruise is its new brand.The all-inclusive packages include onboard accommodation, unlimited bar and beverage packages, gratuities, port charges and taxes. For more information yourcubacruise.com or call 020 8545 2617. Related articles
